pkgmetadata.longdescription: Antimicrobial Resistance Analysis // Functions to simplify the analysis and prediction of Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR) and to work with microbial and antimicrobial properties by using evidence-based methods, like those defined by Leclercq et al. (2013) doi:10.1111/j.1469-0691.2011.03703.x and the Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute (2014) isbn: 1-56238-899-1.
